title: Franco Gidaszewski | Portfolio
description: Backend Developer specialized in Python, FastAPI, Django
name: Franco Gidaszewski
about: As a seasoned backend developer with experience in web development, I excel in crafting bespoke solutions that empower clients to optimize productivity and streamline operations. Specializing in Python, I am driven by a passion for leveraging cutting-edge technology to deliver tailored software solutions that address the unique needs of businesses.

experience.title: Linkacode
experience.subtitle: Co-Founder & Backend Engineer
experience.description: Linkacode is a side project that I coordinate together with colleagues in which we offer cutting-edge software solutions. My main tasks are to lead and execute the projects following the appropriate methodologies. The last project in which I was part of the development team was the creation and implementation of an API for one of the most important technological universities in Argentina. We improve the productivity of students, professors and university workers thanks to our software. We increased student use of the website by 25% thanks to our API that facilitates quick access to each student's class schedule. The technologies I used and implemented were: Python, Django & Django Rest, PostgreSQL, Linux, Git, Trello.

experience.title: UTN Haedo
experience.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: I developed plugins and web components that helped increase the productivity of the workers using the website. I helped the development team considerably in the refactoring of the website code. Actively participate in meetings and discussions with the development team to plan new projects and improve current ones. The technologies I used and implemented were: JavaScript, Python, Wordpress, MySQL, HTML, CSS.

experience.title: Costa Rio Parana
experience.subtitle: Backend Developer
experience.description: Developed comprehensive solutions as a Backend Developer, utilizing Python, Django, MySQL and deploying servers with Nginx on Linux environments. Led the technical implementation of automations, ensuring efficiency and compliance with functional and non- functional requirements.

projects.title: MarathonMaster
projects.subtitle: Software as a Service
projects.description: I am working on a robust API in order to create a SaaS designed for sporting event organizers and their respective users. This online platform offers a wide range of solutions for both end users and customers of the service.
